title: Autofill
body: Y is it that every fucking time i get my role in league of legends draft normal, someone goes "I got autofill, top or troll". And then i waste 30 min of my life because of some idiot. Im so fucking close to leave league of legends, wtf happend to my favorite game...

replies.body:
tfw your first ranked game gets autofilled to your weakest role (adc) and you go 15/2 lmao.

Only to then lose the next 5 games on your main role.

The depression is real.

yep I complain about the same sht, or you get auto fill and in a role you can bare little help to a team with or the other team is just way better skill wise and team work wise, or your team stomps the fk out of them bots style. nup nothing wrong with this riot. they are useless mate, but wait its a privilege to play. even though we are paying customers to a business. righto. gj destroying a great game, no wait don't listen to us, listen to the noobs who tell you nothing is wrong, because there is enough of them to pay your wages......isn't there?
We have no draft normals on OCE...

That too. I would rather draft normal with auto fill rather than blind pick where all you see is

Mid
mid
idm
mid
mid
Mdi
Mid
mid
idm
mid
mid
Mdi

every time you join.

Riot have removed Draft Normals from almost every server.
That isn't going to happen.

But, what I, and many other people has asked, is that in the normal games, we get the role selector, just no pick and ban phase.

> [{quoted}](name=Kanel Kagemand,realm=EUW,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=AluirZKn,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-02-12T16:11:13.572+0000)
>
> wtf happend to my favorite game...

Crybaby noobs happened to your favorite game.

Auto fill on 24 hours a day (literally) on OCE. Was off for 4 hours a day at start of season, but since the intiial buzz is over and player numbers have dropped, it's now all day, every day, no exceptions.
